thread.title: Future Watches Russell Wilson & Seattle Seahawks Lose To Atlanta Falcons From The Sidelines
thread.title_full: Future Watches Russell Wilson & Seattle Seahawks Lose To Atlanta Falcons From The Sidelines

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Future Watches Russell Wilson & Seattle Seahawks Lose To Atlanta Falcons From The Sidelines

organizations.name: seattle seahawks lose to atlanta falcons

text:
17 
Atlanta, GA ‚Äì Chalk up a W for Future as 2017 is just getting underway. The Freebandz leader stood on the sidelines as his hometown Atlanta Falcons beat Russell Wilson and the Seattle Seahawks in the NFC Divisional Playoffs 36-20 yesterday (January 14). Wilson, who is married to Future‚Äôs ex-fianc√©e Ciara and is expecting a child with her, went 17-of-30 for two touchdowns and two interceptions in the loss, which ended the Seahawks‚Äô season. Future is here, Falcons fans https://t.co/IxT7Wwrnrz pic.twitter.com/xIrqSO24wU 
The Falcons refrained from playing any of Future‚Äôs music during the game, with head coach Dan Quinn saying days before the matchup that ‚Äú We will absolutely not go down that road .‚Äù 
But the internet wasn‚Äôt letting Wilson off so easily. Especially with another of Ciara‚Äôs exes, Bow Wow , at the game. There was plenty of pettiness from the streets of Twitter whether the Falcons wanted it or not. So Future & Bow Wow showed up to the Falcons vs. Seahawks game tonight üòÇ pic.twitter.com/4YTr5qffG7 
‚Äî Shahaad East (@shahaadeast) January 14, 2017 When you get to the stadium and see future and bow wow on the sideline pic.twitter.com/vU7Ob2b09S 
‚Äî Sept 4th (@DubOnDaBeatz) January 14, 2017 Future and Lil Bow Wow bout to do a duet of "I Hit It First" by Ray J at halftime of the #SEAvsATL game. pic.twitter.com/Cj8xiAJtde
